DataElement.preferredName: Patient Finasteride Hormone Therapy Personal Medical History End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the end date that hormone therapy, various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level, using finasteride, a synthetic azasteroid compound that binds to and inhibits 5-alpha-reductase, thereby interfering with the enzymatic conversion of testosterone to 5-dihydrotestosterone, ultimately interfering with prostate growth, was used according to a patient's personal medical history, an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Finasteride Hormone Therapy Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient's personal medical history, an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced, including hormone therapy, various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level, using finasteride, a synthetic azasteroid compound that binds to and inhibits 5-alpha-reductase, thereby interfering with the enzymatic conversion of testosterone to 5-dihydrotestosterone, ultimately interfering with prostate growth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Finasteride Hormone Therapy Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: A synthetic azasteroid compound.  Finasteride binds to and inhibits 5-alpha-reductase, thereby interfering with the enzymatic conversion of testosterone to 5-dihydrotestosterone, ultimately interfering with prostate growth. (NCI):Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A synthetic 4-azasteroid compound. Finasteride competitively binds to and inhibits steroid type II 5-alpha-reductase in the prostate gland, liver, and skin, thereby interfering with the enzymatic conversion of testosterone to 5-dihydrotestosterone (DHT) and reducing serum DHT levels. The reduction in serum DHT levels results in diminished stimulation of androgen receptors in the nuclei of prostate cells and, so, diminished prostate cell proliferation.

Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event ended.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
